Given users have been created with default attributes and without skeleton file
When attacker logs in using the webUI with malicious content
Then the input should be sanitized and verified before it is used as proper input

Given user Alice has been created with default attributes and without skeleton And Attacker has not logged in And Attacker has browsed to the personal general settings page When the user changes the email address to 'new-address@owncloud.com' using the webUI And the user follows the email change confirmation link received by 'new-address@owncloud.com' using the webUI Then he must be authenticated and authorized before granting access
